titles.title: A bill to limit the role of political action committees in federal elections.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: 10/6/1987--Introduced. Amends the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to decrease from $5,000 to $2,500 the amount a multicandidate political committee may contribute to any candidate and the candidate's authorized political committees with respect to any Federal election.
